title: Aspect for capturing config data of a connector

pageSize.title: The page size when retieve records from remote data source.

ignoreHarvestSources.title: A list of harvester names to be ignored from source

items.title: The harvester name to be ignored from source.

allowedOrganisationName.title: If specified, the connector will only capture the data from this organisation

extras.title: Extra metadata a connector may have

presetRecordAspects.title: Predefined aspects that will set to all records (except this connector record) that created by this connector

opType.title: Operation Type
opType.description:
This field defines how attach the aspect to records that created by connectors:
- MERGE: aspect data will merge with the existing aspect data of the specified aspect(if any)
- REPLACE:  aspect data will replace the existing aspect data of the specified aspect(if any)
- FILL: aspect data will only be attached to records if no existing aspect data of the specified aspect
